items.name: hooks-use-controlled-state
items.title: useControlledState
items.description: A hook that allows you to control a state.

items.name: hooks-use-data-state
items.title: useDataState
items.description: A hook that allows you to get the data-state of an element.

items.name: hooks-use-is-in-view
items.title: useIsInView
items.description: A hook that allows you to check if an element is in view.

items.name: hooks-use-strict-context
items.title: useStrictContext
items.description: A hook that allows you to create a strict context.

items.name: primitives-animate-slot
items.title: Animate Slot
items.description: A slot component that allows you to use motion components with any element.

items.name: primitives-base-accordion
items.title: Base Accordion
items.description: An easily stylable accordion component.

items.name: primitives-base-checkbox
items.title: Base Checkbox
items.description: An easily stylable checkbox component.

items.name: primitives-base-collapsible
items.title: Base Collapsible
items.description: A collapsible panel controlled by a button.

items.name: primitives-buttons-button
items.title: Button
items.description: A simple button that animates on hover and tap.

items.name: primitives-buttons-flip
items.title: Flip Button
items.description: A button that flips between two states on hover.

items.name: primitives-buttons-liquid
items.title: Liquid Button
items.description: A button that fills on hover.

items.name: primitives-buttons-ripple
items.title: Ripple Button
items.description: A button that animates on tap with a ripple effect.

items.name: primitives-effects-blur
items.title: Blur
items.description: An effect that allows you to animate elements with a blur effect on first view or load.

items.name: primitives-effects-effect
items.title: Effect
items.description: An effect that allows you to animate elements on first view or load.

items.name: primitives-effects-fade
items.title: Fade
items.description: An effect that allows you to animate elements with a fade effect on first view or load.

items.name: primitives-effects-highlight
items.title: Highlight
items.description: A highlight effect that allows you to highlight elements on hover, click or with a controlled value.

items.name: primitives-effects-magnetic
items.title: Magnetic
items.description: A magnetic effect that clings to the cursor, creating a magnetic attraction effect.

items.name: primitives-effects-slide
items.title: Slide
items.description: An effect that allows you to animate elements with a slide effect on first view or load.

items.name: primitives-effects-zoom
items.title: Zoom
items.description: An effect that allows you to animate elements with a zoom effect on first view or load.

items.name: primitives-headless-checkbox
items.title: Headless Checkbox
items.description: Checkboxes provide the same functionality as native HTML checkboxes, without any of the styling, giving you a clean slate to design them however you'd like.

items.name: primitives-headless-dialog
items.title: Headless Dialog
items.description: A fully-managed, renderless dialog component jam-packed with accessibility and keyboard features, perfect for building completely custom dialogs and alerts.

items.name: primitives-headless-disclosure
items.title: Headless Disclosure
items.description: A simple, accessible foundation for building custom UIs that show and hide content, like togglable accordion panels.

items.name: primitives-headless-popover
items.title: Headless Popover
items.description: Popovers are perfect for floating panels with arbitrary content like navigation menus, mobile menus and flyout menus.

items.name: primitives-headless-switch
items.title: Headless Switch
items.description: Switches are a pleasant interface for toggling a value between two states, and offer the same semantics and keyboard navigation as native checkbox elements.

items.name: primitives-headless-tabs
items.title: Headless Tabs
items.description: Easily create accessible, fully customizable tab interfaces, with robust focus management and keyboard navigation support.

items.name: primitives-radix-accordion
items.title: Radix Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal an associated section of content.

items.name: primitives-radix-checkbox
items.title: Radix Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: primitives-radix-collapsible
items.title: Radix Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

items.name: primitives-radix-dialog
items.title: Radix Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window, rendering the content underneath inert.

items.name: primitives-radix-dropdown-menu
items.title: Radix Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button.

items.name: primitives-radix-hover-card
items.title: Radix Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.name: primitives-radix-popover
items.title: Radix Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

items.name: primitives-radix-progress
items.title: Radix Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.

items.name: primitives-radix-radio-group
items.title: Radix Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.

items.name: primitives-radix-switch
items.title: Radix Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: primitives-radix-tabs
items.title: Radix Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.

items.name: primitives-radix-toggle-group
items.title: Radix Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

items.name: primitives-radix-tooltip
items.title: Radix Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

items.name: primitives-shadcn-sheet
items.title: Shadcn Sheet
items.description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main content of the screen.

items.name: primitives-texts-counting-number
items.title: Counting Number
items.description: A counting number animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-gradient
items.title: Gradient Text
items.description: A gradient text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-highlight
items.title: Highlight Text
items.description: A highlight text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-rolling
items.title: Rolling Text
items.description: A rolling text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-rotating
items.title: Rotating Text
items.description: A rotating text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-shimmering
items.title: Shimmering Text
items.description: A shimmering text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-sliding-number
items.title: Sliding Number
items.description: A sliding number animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-splitting
items.title: Splitting Text
items.description: A splitting text animation.

items.name: primitives-texts-typing
items.title: Typing Text
items.description: A typing text animation.
